text: Sano ungawaga umbone wa Allah kuti uli penumwe (Muhammadi ï·º) kwisa soni chanasa Chakwe, chisimu likuga line mwa jamanjao lingasachilile kuti linsokonesye, ni ngakunsokonesya (jwalijose) ikaweje achimisyene, soni nganawa ampele wanganyao chisausyo chilichose, ni antuluchisye Allah Chitabu kwisa soni lunda lwakusokoka, soni an'jiganyisye yamwaliji nkakuimanyilila, ni uwele umbone wa Allah wauli penumwe wekulungwa kusyene
